title: [Rant] Can't play games with college wifi in EC campus TT(clash royal)
content: they hav banned some games to be able to play with college wifi :(

comments.body: The wifi works for me though
wifi works, but not for games, yt and google and other stuff still work through clg wifi
there was a time where chess was banned , but clash royale used to work.
People use VPN in RV to bypass it. Lol
